_metadata._comment_2: Category ID: bin_collection. Registered in category-registry.json.
_metadata._comment_3: Contains: Bin Out (put bin out the night before) and Bin In (bring bin back after collection).
_metadata._comment_4: Both tasks are typically created together via bin collection API lookup.
